revised_title: The Structure and Development of the Chorda Dorsalis in Plagiostomes and Other Fishes
tldr: The author investigates the structure and development of the chorda dorsalis in various fish species, particularly plagiostomes, and examines its role in the formation of vertebral bodies. The study reveals the process of ossification and cartilage formation, as well as the involvement of the outer ossifying layer in the development of vertebral bodies.
